name: Cavern Quest (MrMFWIC007)
description:
Cavern Quest is a side scrolling platformer with an emphasis on parkour and narration. My goal is to create an environment that players can immerse themselves in, with a story that they players can easily imagine continuing on at a later time.

In Cavern Quest, you play as an adventurer who had found a scroll in their local tavern. This scroll had mentioned a talisman of unbelievable power, hidden away deep in the abandoned Dwarven Caverns of old. As you make your way to the location of this talisman, you notice that the would around you is changing, filled with a dark and evil magic. Malicious creatures attempt to stop you, as your focus shifts from retrieving a treasure, to uncovering a dangerous mystery.

Controls

A - Move left

D - Move right

W - Jump

I - Attack1

O - Attack2

P - Ranged attack

SPACE - Skip typewriting

L-Shift - Exit narration
